message: Yet another ex-GCS employee is speaking out saying "They are the laughingstock of the industry. I confronted GCS about their employee treatment and they basically said they didn't care." Read the full comment here:
story: Mohamed Alaa El Din shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: GCS Company Review & Why you shouldn’t work in GCS

description: GCS Company Review & Why you shouldn’t work in GCS: Propose of this post: I’m writing this post today to spread awareness and review about one software development company in Egypt known as GCS, some people refer to it as GCSSD or Global Consulting Services and Software development.
